01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: Robot, kick him in the knees. Bears have weak knees.

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: He should vibrate, 'cause the robot's full of radiation.

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: Yeah, that's it.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Frank? How many bears did I say you could have?

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: One.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: And how many do you see here?

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: Um, four?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Save a little money for the rest of us, Frank.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: You can't spend a bunch of money on bear suits, that are only gonna be seen for like 25 seconds.

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: Liz, nobody's gonna believe that a killer robot, can get his ass kicked by one bear. It doesn't make any sense.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: You're trying to bring logic to the robot-bear sketch? You can't have four bears!

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: Well, how many can I keep?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: One!

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: Sorry, guys. Sam, why don't you stay?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Who did my sudoku puzzle? I have been looking forward to this puzzle all morning.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Hey, Liz, could you come up to my office, when you have a free moment?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: I never have a free moment, Jack... never, ever.

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: Really punch him, like karate.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Are you familiar with the Japanese art of reiki?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: No.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: It is the laying on of hands in order to improve one's life.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Hmm. How does you life improve? Do the hands have money in them?

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Human contact is important, Lemon.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: I can tell from your stress level, that you have not been touched in any way in quite some time... not caressed, not massaged, not even groped on the subway.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Where are you headed with this?

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Your mood affects the quality of your work,, which, in turn, affects me.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: I would like to become a resource to you, for improving your personal life.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Do you agree that you need someone in your life, Lemon?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: No, I have bigger things to worry about, than my personal life.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: I would think that a single woman's biggest worry, would be choking to death alone in her apartment.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: I have a friend in town I'd like to set you up with.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: No, thank you.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Thomas is very bright, has a wonderful sense of humor.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: I think it's a good match. Are you free on Thursday?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: No, Thursday is poker night,, and, by the way, it is completely inappropriate, for you to be questioning me about my private life, and then trying to set me up with someone, when you don't even know anything about me.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Poker night? Who plays?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Really, that's all you got out of that?

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: I enjoy poker. I'd be interested in seeing my new employees, under that kind of pressure.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: You're not gonna come to our crappy poker game, are you?

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: No, I'm not.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Good.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: I bluffed. Yes, I am coming.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: 3 can't go here. 3 can't go here. Can't go here. It can go here.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Fine, I'll meet your friend.

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: So, who is this Thomas guy?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Oh, I don't know. He's one of Jack's friends.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Oh, my God, isn't Jack friends with Tom DeLay?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Am I going on a date with Tom DeLay?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Oh, why did I say I would do this?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: I haven't been on a date since Dennis and I broke up, and that was almost a year ago.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: It's gonna be a complete disaster.

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: It's just one date. But if it is Tom DeLay and you do go home with him,, be prepared for it to get weird.

01x02.name: Tracy
01x02.line: Josh, you and me, Thursday night. I know this guy that runs an underground bird fight.

01x02.name: Josh
01x02.line: Oh, yeah. I can't do that. Thursday's poker night here.

01x02.name: PA
01x02.line: Guys, we just need to try the green-screen stuff, one more time.

01x02.name: Tracy
01x02.line: Poker night? I love poker!

01x02.name: Tracy
01x02.line: I used to play all kinds of poker with my aunts... Crazy 7, Albuquerque Freak-Out, One-Card Stud.

01x02.name: Josh
01x02.line: Yeah, I don't think those are real games.

01x02.name: Tracy
01x02.line: Whatever. Get ready to get took.

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: No, Mom, I can't make it Friday. I got to work.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Hey, Frank?

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: Hold on.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Yeah? What do guys like?

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: Uh, porn.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: No, I mean, if you were gonna go on a date with a woman,, how would you want her to act?

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: Like she was in a porn.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Hey, Lemon... you're on for 8:00 for dinner at Caf√© des Artistes.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Really? Wow.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: What? What are you gonna wear?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: This, probably. I don't have time to go home.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: No, that won't do.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: I want you to go out on your lunch hour, and find something... in a women's clothing store.

01x02.name: Tracy
01x02.line: Remind me what's better,, a pair of black aces or a pair of red aces.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: You guys, I'm leaving.

01x02.name: Writers
01x02.line: Whoo-hoo!

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: All right, all right.

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: Hey, look at you! You look like a fancy prostitute.

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: Okay, I got my chair. I got my beer. I got my lucky doughnut.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Oh, is there room for one more?

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: Yeah, sure. Really?

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: That's fantastic.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Could we just, uh, this. Ah, yes, yes, yes.

01x02.name: Tracy
01x02.line: Donaghy, what up?

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: What up, Tra?

01x02.name: Tracy
01x02.line: This round, Texas Doozy. Face cards are wild, 3 is a jinx, 5s are 2s.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Tra, do you mind if I deal this hand?

01x02.name: Tracy
01x02.line: Be my guest. Show me love.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Ladies and gentlemen, the minimum bet in this game is $25.

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: Oh, Jack, we usually just play for quarters.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Well, then you best go home and put on your daddy's shoes, boy. This is a man's game.

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: Okay. I call.

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: And I'll see that with this thing.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: I call.

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: Pair of jacks.

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: Ace-high.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Three cowboys.

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: Oh, my God, my wedding ring. Oh, my God. Oh, my God. Oh, my God.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Now, you should all learn from Pete's mistake.

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: My wife's gonna k*ll me!

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: You see, in poker, as in business, the key to success, is to determine your opponent's strength, and, more importantly, his weaknesses.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Everyone has a tell... a weakness of character that manifests itself physically.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Like, when Lutz here has a good hand, he stops eating.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: When Frank is bluffing, he asks a series of inane questions, to hide his nervousness.

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: Oh, really, is that what you think? Is that what I do? Am I doing that right now?

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: Yeah, I'm out.

01x02.name: Tracy
01x02.line: Okay, Rain Man, tell me what I got.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Well, you have two of your cards backwards, actually.

01x02.name: Tracy
01x02.line: I'm out.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Hi, Pinot Grigio, please.

01x02.name: Waiter
01x02.line: Mm-hmm.

01x02.name: Toofer
01x02.line: This is beyond the pale. Donaghy took me for $200.

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: Yeah, well, I bet my rent money,, and if I don't pay by the 10th, my mom's gonna throw me out.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: I'm all-in. Anybody else?

01x02.name: Kenneth
01x02.line: Oh, I'll play with you, Mr. Donaghy.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Kenneth, how long you been sitting there?

01x02.name: Kenneth
01x02.line: I'm taking Pete's place, 'cause he's busy in the bathroom,, laying in his own sick.

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: Oh, my God. He can't read Kenneth. He's a blank slate.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Okay, what do you got?

01x02.name: Kenneth
01x02.line: I think I have what they refer to as a royal flush.

01x02.name: Kenneth
01x02.line: Looks like I'm the big winner.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Thank you.

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: Liz?

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: Hi, I'm Gretchen Thomas, Jack's friend.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Hey.

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: Great to meet you. Hi.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Why would Jack just assume that we're lesbians?

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: I am a lesbian.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Mmm, that's awesome.

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: Is this the first time, somebody's made that assumption about you?

01x02.name: Coach
01x02.line: Lemon, don't let these girls give you a hard time, about who you are.

01x02.name: Dentist
01x02.line: You know, you need to brush your teeth more, young man.

01x02.name: Elderly Woman
01x02.line: Oh, my, what an adorable little lesbian.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: What? I don't know. Who remembers that kind of thing?

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: Oh, well, look, obviously, this is a miscommunication. I'm certainly not interested in chasing a straight girl.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Of course, yeah.

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: I completely understand if you just want to go home.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: No, it's fine. I'll stay.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Jack is ridiculous.

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: Oh, I worked with Jack in plastics.

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: He tends to approach everything the same way... locate the problem, isolate the problem,, set the problem up with a lesbian.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: That's a pretty good joke for somebody from plastics.

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: Well, I wasn't always in plastics. I used to work in water-process technologies, working mainly in primary metals.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Oh, so you have a comedy background?

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: How was your evening with Thomas?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: You mean Gretchen Thomas, the brilliant plastics engineer/lesbian?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: What made you think I was gay?

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Your shoes.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Well, I'm straight.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Those shoes are definitely bi-curious.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Regardless, I am straight... 100% completely straight.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Well, I'm sorry if I offended you.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: No, I'm not offended.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Good.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: What do you know about Kenneth, the page?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: I don't know. He's a sweet kid.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Yes, and a surprisingly good poker player.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Did you know that his middle name is Ellen?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: No, that's weird.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: That his Myers-Briggs psychological testing, shows a rare combination, of extroverted, intuitive, and aggressive?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Really?

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: It's the same as mine.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: He could be trouble down the line.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Kenneth?

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Kenneth Ellen.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: All right, then, you're not a lesbian... duly noted. I'll correct that on your file.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: It's too bad, though. Thomas thought you were great.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: She did?

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Yes. She said she thought you looked like Jennifer Jason Leigh.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Really, she said that?

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Yes, I made her repeat it. I was sure she meant Jason Lee.

01x02.name: PA
01x02.line: Jenna, set yourself, please, for "Dancing with the Deity."

01x02.name: Kenneth
01x02.line: Miss Lemon?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Yes?

01x02.name: Kenneth
01x02.line: This is Pete's wedding ring. I won it last night, but I don't think I should keep it. Could you give it back to him for me?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Yeah, okay.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Did you win this, too?

01x02.name: Kenneth
01x02.line: I did. I love how the light catches it like diamonds.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Kenneth, it is diamonds.

01x02.name: Kenneth
01x02.line: Ah, hi, Mr. Donaghy. Can I help you with something?

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: You are a puzzle, Kenneth Ellen. And I'm going to solve you. Yes, I am.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: I can't believe you bet your wedding ring.

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: I know. Weird thing is, I had money left.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Hey, um, what famous person would you say I look like?

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: Uh, present-day Linda Ronstadt.

01x02.name: Toofer
01x02.line: No, Ruth Bader Ginsburg.

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: Tootsie.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Oh, never mind.

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: So, how was your date?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: It wasn't a good match.

01x02.name: Toofer
01x02.line: What happened? Did he notice your facial tic?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: No.

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: Did you wear sandals? Did he see your toes?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: No.

01x02.name: Lutz
01x02.line: You blew it, didn't you?

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: Good job, Liz. Way to go.

01x02.name: Toofer
01x02.line: Another one bites the dust.

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: Aw, look at your little face.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: It was a lady!

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: Are you serious? Oh!

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Where is my Emmy?

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: Hello?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Hi, Gretchen. It's Liz Lemon.

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: Oh, hi.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Look, this is gonna sound really weird, but, um, do you ever worry about choking to death alone, in your apartment?

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: Oh, it's so weird you would say that. I think about it all the time.

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: I mean, you'd die, and they wouldn't find you, until your neighbor's dog smelled you from the hallway.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Oh, yes, and they'd show a picture of you on "NY1."

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: And it's not just choking.

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: Ever since I turned 30, every time I get in or out of the bathtub,, I think in my head, "Careful, careful."

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Yes! Oh! Everything's the worst.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Do you want to get some dinner?

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: Sure. I'll see you in 20 at Neptune.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Yeah, okay,

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Oh! Oh, oh, oh! I can't...

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: I did not die.

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: Man, this is amazing.

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: Oh, hey, Jack.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Welcome. Welcome, everybody.

01x02.name: Tracy
01x02.line: Damn, Jack, you went all-out. That's a giant shrimp.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Made out of shrimp and diving into a bowl of shrimp.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Please, enjoy, Tracy. Hey, Pete, good to see you.

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: Jack.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Is Kenneth here?

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: I... I will check.

01x02.name: Tracy
01x02.line: I've been playing for two hours. I'm tired of losing. I'm gonna let my boy Dot Com play a hand for me.

01x02.name: Tracy
01x02.line: So, hey, Dot Com, are we going to those three clubs tonight?

01x02.name: Tracy
01x02.line: You know, the doctor said I have four hearts in my body?

01x02.name: Josh
01x02.line: All right. Come on.

01x02.name: Tracy
01x02.line: Damn it.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Hey, everybody, this is Gretchen.

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: Oh, hey.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Thomas.

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: Jack.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: How's everybody up there in Pittsfield?

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: We miss you.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: I love this woman.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Let's play some poker.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: I call. What have you got, Kenneth?

01x02.name: Kenneth
01x02.line: All clovers. I win.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Very clever boy, Kenneth,, but the curtain has been drawn back now,, and I know the real you.

01x02.name: Kenneth
01x02.line: I think he's confusing me with someone else.

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: Liz, are you sure you're not gay? Because that chick is hot.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: We're just friends, like Oprah and Gayle. Why is that so hard for everybody to believe?

01x02.name: PEte
01x02.line: She's great. You should marry that girl.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Yeah, one problem... I'm not gay.

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: Oh, Lemon, in the 10 years that I've known you,, you've had some really terrible boyfriends.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: I have.

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: There was the guy who was obsessed with Charlie Chaplin.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Neil.

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: There was the guy who played Halo under the name Slut Banger.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Dennis.

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: There was a tall, gangly, red-haired guy, who played guitar all the time.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Conan.

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: You're more relaxed with Gretchen, than you were with any of those guys.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: So, what are you saying, Pete, I should just be a lesbian?

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: Oh, I'm not saying it'll be easy. You know, get drunk first.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Why do guys think women can just flip a switch like that?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: What if I said to you, "Go be with Frank now"?

01x02.name: Pete
01x02.line: Ah, I would be honored. Frank is a very tender, beautiful man.

01x02.name: Frank
01x02.line: He's awesome. You can't read his thoughts 'cause he doesn't have any.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: I raise you $200.

01x02.name: Kenneth
01x02.line: And I see your $200 and raise you $300.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Will you,, little Kenneth Ellen Parcell from Stone Mountain, Georgia,, growing up in your mama's tract house,, dreaming of working on a TV show,, dreaming of making it all the way to the NBC?

01x02.name: Kenneth
01x02.line: You're scaring me, Mr. Donaghy.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: You've come a long way, haven't you, Kenneth Ellen, with your cheap loafers and your page jacket? But you'll always be a pig farmer's son, boy,, 'cause I smell fried bologna all over you.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: I'm all-in.

01x02.name: Kenneth
01x02.line: I'm out of chips, Mr. Donaghy.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Hey, I got a fun idea. You put your page jacket on the table. And if you win, you can get it back. If you lose... you go on home. You go on home, little Kenneth Ellen... all the way to Stone Mountain.

01x02.name: Crowd
01x02.line: Go for it!

01x02.name: Lutz
01x02.line: He's bluffing!

01x02.name: Crowd
01x02.line: Do it!

01x02.name: Crowd
01x02.line: Test yourself.

01x02.name: Crowd
01x02.line: Don't do it.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: I've got a pair of 2s.

01x02.name: Kenneth
01x02.line: Well, let's just seeby-weeby here.

01x02.name: Kenneth
01x02.line: I've got a 2, a 4,, a 9, a 6, and a king.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: That means I win.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Kenneth, why did you bet that terrible hand?

01x02.name: Kenneth
01x02.line: Why? Because I believe that life is for the living. I believe in taking risks, and biting off more than you can chew.

01x02.name: Kenneth
01x02.line: And, also, people were yelling,, and I got confused about the rules.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Kenneth? I wasn't really going to fire you. I just wanted to remind you that I could.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: I want you back here at 6:00 in the morning sharp, so you can sweep up these shrimp tails.

01x02.name: Kenneth
01x02.line: Yes, sir, Mr. Donaghy.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: Uh, I'm gonna have my eye on you, Kenneth.

01x02.name: Kenneth
01x02.line: You will not be disappointed, sir.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Well, it was nice of you to let him keep his job.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: The Italians have a saying, Lemon.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: "Keep your friends close and your enemies closer.", And although they've never won a war, or mass-produced a decent car, in this area, they are correct.

01x02.name: Jack
01x02.line: In five years, we'll all either be working for him... ...or be dead by his hand.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Hey, after IKEA tomorrow,, you want to go see Margaret Cho at the Beacon?

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: Oh, boy, uh, Oprah?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Yes, Gayle?

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: I think we need to take a break.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Because I wanted to submit us for "The Amazing Race"? Because I was 80% joking about that.

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: No, it's... You know, I said I'm not into chasing straight girls,, and I kind of think that's what's starting to happen here. So, unless you're ready to make a big life change,, I need to move on, find my Stedman.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: I thought I was Oprah in this metaphor. Also, you're gay, so that's a little confusing. You should say, like, "my lady Stedman."

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: Okay, I'm going out on a limb here.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Okay, sorry, um, it's just, uh,, if I try to imagine us being together, I think, "Yeah, okay, this could be fun.", You know, picking out furniture, and making flowerbeds out of old railroad ties.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: But the thing is,, if I'm gonna be with someone, it has to be a guy.

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: You sound pretty sure about that.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: What can I say? I love a bald spot and a hairy back.

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: You're alone there. I should go. I'll see you around.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Okay, wait, um, what if we made a pact? What if we say that in, like, 25 years,, if neither of us has someone,, we'll move in together and be roommates?

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: And even though I am not into the sex stuff,, if it helps you,, I would let you do stuff to me.

01x02.name: Thomas
01x02.line: I can't be around you anymore. Bye, Liz.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: That's funny. That's what the guys always say.

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Who's gonna go with me to cooking class next weekend?

01x02.name: Man
01x02.line: Well, if by "cooking class" you mean your bed, and by "next weekend" you mean tonight...

01x02.name: Liz
01x02.line: Oh, shut up. I can see your wedding ring. Idiot.
